title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature        The Black Canyon hosts a variety of ecosystems from pinyon pine, juniper and scrub oak forests at the rim, to the shady and vertical inner canyon walls, and down to the riparian community along the Gunnison River. NPS Photo by Lisa Lynch       Animals » Plants » Natural Features & Ecosystems »
